metadata.title: CVE-2024-38566 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:bpf: Fix verifier assumptions about socket->skThe verifier assumes that 'sk' field in 'struct socket' is validand non-NULL when 'socket' pointer itself is trusted and non-NULL.That may not be the case when socket was just created andpassed to LSM socket_accept hook.Fix this verifier assumption and adjust tests.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
